ygData.subject: Re: new
ygData.msgSnippet: I would say i spent 80+ platinum and over 1 play DAY getting into the banded stage.  You will run out of money and fight and run out and fight for severla
ygData.messageBody:
I would say i spent 80+ platinum and over 1 play DAY getting into the
banded stage. You will run out of money and fight and run out and fight
for severla levels.

At 08:40 AM 5/4/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Keith R." <blue@...>
>
>Hail. I joined this list because I am considering taking up the
>blacksmithing trade. I haven't read that much on the subject , but I have
>read that blacksmithing is not very profitable. Is this true? I'm willing
>to be patient and invest time in it.
>
>Thanks.
>
